shipment-date.description: The date and time when the shipment was made.

currency.description: The currency used for the monetary values in the data.

item-promotion-discount.description: The discount amount applied to the item as part of the promotion.

item-promotion-id.description: The unique identifier for the item promotion.

description.description: A description of the promotion or shipment.

promotion-rule-value.description: The value associated with the promotion rule.

amazon-order-id.description: The unique identifier for the Amazon order associated with the shipment.

shipment-id.description: The unique identifier for the shipment.

shipment-item-id.description: The unique identifier for the item within the shipment.

dataEndTime.description: The end time for the data collection period.
